policies.name: Any Admin Policy
policies.description: Defines that adminsitrators can do something

policies.name: Any User Policy
policies.description: Defines that only users from well known clients are allowed to access

policies.name: Only From a Specific Client Address
policies.description: Defines that only clients from a specific address can do something

policies.name: Administration Policy
policies.description: Defines that only administrators from a specific network address can do something.

config.applyPolicies: ["Any Admin Policy","Only From a Specific Client Address"]

policies.name: Only Owner and Administrators Policy
policies.description: Defines that only the resource owner and administrators can do something

config.code:
// by default, grants any permission associated with this policy
$evaluation.deny();

policies.name: Only Owner Policy
policies.description: Defines that only the resource owner is allowed to do something

policies.name: Album Resource Permission
policies.description: General policies that apply to all album resources.

policies.name: Admin Resource Permission
policies.description: General policy for any administrative resource.

policies.name: View User Permission
policies.description: Defines who is allowed to view an user profile

policies.name: Delete Album Permission
policies.description: A policy that only allows the owner to delete his albums.

authenticationFlows.description: Handle what to do if there is existing account with same email/username like authenticated identity provider
Used by Docker clients to authenticate against the IDP
Actions taken after first broker login with identity provider account, which is not yet linked to any Keycloak account
Username, password, otp and other auth forms.
Reset credentials for a user if they forgot their password or something
